basics.name: Blake Watkins
basics.label: Software Developer
summary: Currently I enjoy programming for both front and back end environments, more recently with React libraries and latest ES standards and releases; and really enjoy the ease of Node development and am excited to build more backend projects with it.

I have a deep love for linguistic inquiry, which has led me into the realm of computation and programming, and also has me very interested in functional programming concepts. I'm an open guy, so connect with me and we can talk about programming, surf, language, or giant swirling meteorological monsters in the middle of the ocean.
Integrating sensitive front end data to back end API with PostgresQL database hooks
Facilitate team of developers in building UI/UX functionality
Determine best methods for HIPAA compliance - auditing, logging, data masking, best development practice for ensuring client data privacy

work.website: RaicesPeruanas.com (Dev phase, not staged to domain name yet)
summary: Redesign of older website, with aims of modernizing UX, and building on PoC and SEO capabilities
Built with React library, utilizing variety of current 3rd party react libraries to design an isomorphic application
AWS services(Lambda, DynamoDB, EC2) implemented to take advantage of practical usage models
Working on various development projects for non-profits and private parties.
Provided counseling and therapeutic services for persons with acute mental health diagnoses
Trained in Motivational Interviewing and Mindfulness practices
Managed project that fully transitioned organization of 200+ employees to an EMR cloud-based service

projects.name: mirageJS
summary: Developed methods to layer and manipulate video streams and canvasses by utilizing canvas, webRTC, and TrackingJS APIs
Deployed javascript library API via NPM, that accepts custom animation functions, exposes data channel and stream events, and optionally offers an audio/video capable component
Utilized web worker contexts to optimize complex canvas and tracking operations
Built communication logic with websocket and REST API over HTTPS, inserting hooks into webRTC signaling to establish client connections
Designed functionality on back end to persist identifying client data within socket events, permitting dynamic member and room CRUD operations

projects.name: Sip
summary: Constructed node streams to issue portions of readfile data dependent on specific client-side requests
Developed front and backend APIs to enable server side middleware operations
Scaled concatenation of back end data streams, piping data for both input/output logic to set up final client payload

projects.name: Spik-izi
summary: Created API logic controller within React framework to serve as user friendly linguistic aide for educational purposes
Setup RESTful API to serve custom etymological data upon AJAX requests
Utilized React library to architect a system of modular components to enable reusability of components
Provide general assistance to organization's drop-in services.
